name: Spider Flight 3D
description:
New York, 20XX. The darkness of evil powers is gathering in one of the world's biggest cities. This time, citizens need a new hero to come and save them. Can you become the chosen one? Will you meet their expectations? No one comes to help you, a newborn hero.

The metropolis is in your hands, and you're the last hope of its people. The fate gave you a spider skills to make your battle much easier, tall buildings and skyscrapers are now your home and your battlefield.

- choose between 3 characters, a female character is available now;
- use your spider sense to figure out the enemy's location
- use your spider web to move from one building to another
- train your spider skills while enjoying the metropolis' view

Use your talent and your skills wisely, annihilate your enemies and clear the city, which already has become a real mess. Don't lose this battle, hero!
